blogPost.excerpt: A powerful no-code headless commerce landing page builder with customizable, built-in checkouts 🌐 Create shoppable landing pages for limited product releases, campaigns, PPC campaigns & more ✅ Syncs with Shopify 🛍 Powered by Commerce.js, Next.js, and Vercel
blogPost.body: A powerful no-code headless commerce landing page builder with customizable, built-in checkouts 🌐 Create shoppable landing pages for limited product releases, campaigns, PPC campaigns & more ✅ Syncs with Shopify 🛍 Powered by Commerce.js, Next.js, and Vercel
blogPost.title: Commerce Rays - No-code commerce landing page builder w/ built-in checkouts.
blogPost.author: Nik Sharma

localize.description: 一款强大的无代码无头商务登陆页面生成器，具有可定制的内置结账功能 ✅与Shopify同步 ✅与Commerce.js、Next.js和Vercel同步。
localize.tagline: 无需编码的商务登陆页面生成器，内置结账功能。

localize.description: 一款強大的無代碼無頭商務登陸頁面生成器，具有可定製的內置結賬功能 ✅與Shopify同步 ✅與Commerce.js、Next.js和Vercel同步。
localize.tagline: 無需編碼的商務登陸頁面生成器，內置結賬功能。

previous.excerpt: Duffel makes travel selling easy, fast, and developer-friendly. Our API enables any travel business to start selling flights from a network of leading airlines in minutes, not months.
previous.title: Duffel - The best API to sell flights online

localize.description: Duffel让旅游销售变得简单、快捷、方便开发者。我们的API使任何旅游企业能够在几分钟内，而不是几个月内开始销售领先航空公司网络的航班。
Duffel讓旅遊銷售變得簡單、快捷、方便開發者。我們的API使任何旅遊企業能夠在幾分鐘內，而不是幾個月內開始銷售領先航空公司網絡的航班。
